pullRequest.title: Build: fix eclipse after icTests
pullRequest.bodyText:
We made a small mistake when breaking out the ESIntegTestCase
subclasses that confused eclipse. This makes it happy again. Poor
eclipse!
Relates #55896

commit.message:
Build: fix eclipse after icTests

We made a small mistake when breaking out the `ESIntegTestCase`
subclasses that confused eclipse. This makes it happy again. Poor
eclipse!

Relates #55896

nodes.bodyText: Can we not just do eclipse.getClasspath().getSourceSets().add()? Do we have to fully replace the collection?
